main-thread-stack-size.help: The size of the main thread's stack

timer-thread-stack-size.help: The size of the timer thread's stack

idle-thread-stack-size.help: The size of the idle thread's stack

thread-stack-size.help: The default stack size of new threads

idle-thread-stack-size-tickless-extra.help: Additional size to add to the idle thread when a specific target or application implementation requires it or in case tickless is enabled and LPTICKER_DELAY_TICKS is used

idle-thread-stack-size-debug-extra.help: Additional size to add to the idle thread when code compilation optimisation is disabled

thread-num.help: Maximum number of CMSIS-RTOSv2 object-pool threads that can be active at the same time

thread-user-stack-size.help: The total memory available for all CMSIS-RTOSv2 object-pool thread stacks combined

timer-num.help: Maximum number of CMSIS-RTOSv2 object-pool timers that can be active at the same time

evflags-num.help: Maximum number of CMSIS-RTOSv2 object-pool event flag objects that can be active at the same time

mutex-num.help: Maximum number of CMSIS-RTOSv2 object-pool mutexes that can be active at the same time

semaphore-num.help: Maximum number of CMSIS-RTOSv2 object-pool semaphores that can be active at the same time

msgqueue-num.help: Maximum number of CMSIS-RTOSv2 object-pool message queues that can be active at the same time

msgqueue-data-size.help: The total memory available for all CMSIS-RTOSv2 object-pool message queues combined

enable-all-rtx-events.help: Enables all of the RTX events which are disabled by default for optimization
